00121 /**********************************************************
00122  **     IPv6 Next Header Types                           **
00123  **********************************************************/
00124 
00125 #define UIP_PROTO_ICMP  1
00126 #define UIP_PROTO_TCP   6
00127 #define UIP_PROTO_UDP   17
00128 #define UIP_PROTO_ICMP6 58
00129 
00130 /**********************************************************
00131  **     Size of various headers                          **
00132  **********************************************************/
00133 
00134 #define UIP_IPH_LEN    40
00135 #define UIP_FRAGH_LEN  8
00136 
00137 #define UIP_UDPH_LEN    8    /* Size of UDP header */
00138 #define UIP_TCPH_LEN   20    /* Size of TCP header */
00139 
00140 #define UIP_ICMPH_LEN   4    /* Size of ICMP header */
00141 
00142 #define UIP_IPUDPH_LEN (UIP_UDPH_LEN + UIP_IPH_LEN)    /* Size of IP +
00143                         * UDP
00144                                * header */
00145 #define UIP_IPTCPH_LEN (UIP_TCPH_LEN + UIP_IPH_LEN)    /* Size of IP +
00146                                * TCP
00147                                * header */
00148 #define UIP_TCPIP_HLEN UIP_IPTCPH_LEN
00149 #define UIP_IPICMPH_LEN (UIP_IPH_LEN + UIP_ICMPH_LEN) /* size of ICMP
00150                                                          + IP header */

00241 #define ICMP6_DST_UNREACH                 1 
00242 #define ICMP6_PACKET_TOO_BIG                2   
00243 #define ICMP6_TIME_EXCEEDED             3   
00244 #define ICMP6_PARAM_PROB                   4    
00245 #define ICMP6_ECHO_REQUEST              128  
00246 #define ICMP6_ECHO_REPLY                129  
00248 #define ICMP6_RS                        133  
00249 #define ICMP6_RA                        134

00252 #define ICMP6_REDIRECT                  137

00257   u8_t type, icode;
00258   u16_t icmpchksum;

00269 /* Min and Max compressable UDP ports */
00270 #define SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN                     0xF0B0
00271 #define SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MAX                     0xF0BF   /* F0B0 + 15 */
00272 
00279 #define SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPV6                    0x41 /* 01000001 = 65 */
00280 #define SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_HC1                     0x42 /* 01000010 = 66 */
00281 #define SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC                    0x03 /* 00000011 = 3 */
00282 #define SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_FRAG1                   0xc0 /* 11000xxx */
00283 #define SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_FRAGN                   0xe0 /* 11100xxx */
00284 
00289 #define SIXLOWPAN_HC1_NH_UDP                       0x02
00290 #define SIXLOWPAN_HC1_NH_TCP                       0x06
00291 #define SIXLOWPAN_HC1_NH_ICMP6                     0x04
00292 
00295 /* Min and Max compressable UDP ports */
00296 #define SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN                     0xF0B0
00297 #define SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MAX                     0xF0BF   /* F0B0 + 15 */
00298 
00302 #define SIXLOWPAN_HC_UDP_ALL_C                     0xE0
00303 
00309 /*
00310  * Values of fields within the IPHC encoding first byte
00311  * (C stands for compressed and I for inline)
00312  */
00313 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TC_C                        0x80
00314 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_VF_C                        0x40
00315 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_NH_C                        0x20
00316 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_1                       0x08
00317 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_64                      0x10
00318 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_255                     0x18
00319 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_I                       0x00
00320 
00321 /* Values of fields within the IPHC encoding second byte */
00322 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_I                       0x00
00323 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_64                      0x40
00324 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_16                      0x80
00325 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0                       0xC0
00326 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_I                       0x00
00327 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_64                      0x04
00328 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_16                      0x08
00329 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_0                       0x0C
00330 
00331 /* Link local context number */
00332 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_ADDR_CONTEXT_LL             0
00333 /* 16-bit multicast addresses compression */
00334 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_MCAST_RANGE                 0xA0
00335 
00341 #define SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_ID                       0xF8
00342 #define SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_C                        0xFB
00343 #define SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_I                        0xF8
00344 
00352 #define SIXLOWPAN_IPV6_HDR_LEN                     1    /*one byte*/
00353 #define SIXLOWPAN_HC1_HDR_LEN                      3
00354 #define SIXLOWPAN_HC1_HC_UDP_HDR_LEN               7
00355 #define SIXLOWPAN_FRAG1_HDR_LEN                    4
00356 #define SIXLOWPAN_FRAGN_HDR_LEN                    5

00368   u8_t offset;
00369 };

00382   u8_t ttl;
00383 };

00389   u8_t dispatch;

00392   u8_t ttl;
00393   u8_t ports;

00401 struct sixlowpan_iphc_hdr {
00402   u8_t dispatch;
00403   u8_t encoding[2];
00404 };

00415 struct sixlowpan_addr_context {
00416   u8_t used;
00417   u8_t number;
00418   u8_t prefix[8];
00419 };
00420 
00432 #define sixlowpan_is_iid_16_bit_compressable(a) \
00433   ((((a)->u16[4]) == 0) &&                       \
00434    (((a)->u16[5]) == 0) &&                       \
00435    (((a)->u16[6]) == 0) &&                       \
00436    ((((a)->u8[14]) & 0x80) == 0))
00437 
00445 #define sixlowpan_is_mcast_addr_decompressable(a) \
00446    (((*a & 0x01) == 0) &&                           \
00447     ((*(a + 1) == 0x01) || (*(a + 1) == 0x02)))
00448 
00455 #define sixlowpan_is_mcast_addr_compressable(a) \
00456   ((((a)->u16[1]) == 0) &&                       \
00457    (((a)->u16[2]) == 0) &&                       \
00458    (((a)->u16[3]) == 0) &&                       \
00459    (((a)->u16[4]) == 0) &&                       \
00460    (((a)->u16[5]) == 0) &&                       \
00461    (((a)->u16[6]) == 0) &&                       \
00462    (((a)->u8[14]) == 0) &&                       \
00463    ((((a)->u8[15]) == 1) || (((a)->u8[15]) == 2)))
00464 
00467 #ifndef MSB
00468 #define MSB(x)   ((uint8_t *)&x)[1]
00469 #define LSB(x)   ((uint8_t *)&x)[0]
00470 #endif
00471

00473 /**********************************************************
00474  **     avr-sixlowpan specific typedefs                  **
00475  **********************************************************/
00476 
00477 typedef struct {
00478     uint8_t   ttl;
00479     uint8_t * ttlptr;
00480     uint8_t   proto;
00481     uint8_t   destcontext;
00482     uint8_t   destmode;
00483     uint8_t   srccontext;
00484     uint8_t   srcmode;
00485     uint8_t * srcptr;
00486     uint8_t   mac_hdr_len;
00487 } ipbuf_t;
00488 
00489 /* We just store two things - the prefix checksum, and if the prefix
00490  * is being used. Could even just store checksum, and reserve 0xFFFF value
00491  * as indicator prefix is not used! */
00492 typedef struct {
00493     uint16_t checksum;
00494     uint8_t  is_used;
00495 } sixlowpan_prefix_t;
